summary: Tired of the boring Vanilla Vampire Eyes? This mod adds a new set of eyes for you to choose from.
descriptionHtml:
Tired of the boring Vanilla Vampire Eyes? This mod adds a new set of eyes for you to choose from. As of now, the colors to choose from is :

Red
Dark Red
Blue
Green
Yellow

This mod requires DAWNGUARD DLC

See the screenshots to see which one you would like. This is my first retexture for skyrim so any critisism is welcome! And if there is any color that you think is missing that you would really like, please tell me and I will see what I can do about it!

And make sure to endorse this mod if you like it!
author: TheSkoomaKing
